target_roles.title: mixed farmer
target_roles.description: Mixed farmers are responsible for managing all aspects of livestock and crop production as a small enterprise or for self-sufficiency.
target_roles.essential_skills:
Operate agricultural machinery
Health and safety regulations
Environmental legislation in agriculture and forestry
Supervise hygiene procedures in agricultural settings
Agronomical production principles
Crop production principles
Livestock reproduction
Agricultural production principles
Livestock farming systems
target_roles.optional_skills:
Manage production enterprise
Manage the health and welfare of livestock
Market farm products
Manage farm products
Agricultural business management
Dairy animal production
Agritourism

target_roles.title: software manager
target_roles.description: Software managers oversee the acquisition and development of software systems in order to provide support to all organisational units. They also monitor the results and quality of the different software solutions and projects implemented in the organisation.

Ict project management methodologies
Execute analytical mathematical calculations
